value:
$nMPID_双界リシテア|If I could have any gift this holiday
season, it would be more time to
study. There's so much left to learn!

$nMPID_双界リシテア|Why are sleighs pulled by reindeer?
Think about it: if sleighs were drawn
by pegasi, they could fly!

$nMPID_ルーテ|I've deduced that, although different,
some form of the winter festival is
celebrated in every world. Incredible.

$nMPID_ルーテ|Miracles are the fruit of meticulous
methodology and careful calculations.
It's quite basic...in theory, at least.

$nMPID_ルーテ|Lysithea's love for sweets is logical:
sugar improves one's mood, and
thus enhances cognitive function.

$nMPID_双界リシテア|Here's a winter festival gift
from $Nf.$k$pDelivered, um, flawlessly! Right, Lute?

$nMPID_ルーテ|There is no theory our combined
cognitive muscle could not put to the
test. We're just that good.

$nMPID_双界リシテア|I guess this was an acceptable
performance. But let's redouble our
gift-giving efforts!

$nMPID_双界リシテア|Brrr... By my calculations, it shouldn't
be this cold out. Um, Lute...are your
eyebrows frozen?

$nMPID_ルーテ|These gifts will prove extremely
beneficial in ensuring the success of
the winter festival.

I'm Lysithea, and this is Lute. We
heard you might need some help with
the winter festival, so here we are!

$nMPID_ルーテ|Excellent work today, Lysithea. It was
no small feat getting all of those gifts
delivered on time.$k$p$nMPID_双界リシテア|Careful planning and earnest effort
were key. But I failed to account for
how exhausting it would be.$k$p$nMPID_ルーテ|Perhaps this card will lift your spirits,
then? It's from the children we met,
according to $Nu.$k$p$nMPID_双界リシテア|Oh, how sweet! I can't quite read the
messy handwriting, but it's clear they
loved the gifts we sent them.$k$p$nMPID_ルーテ|Although we did not enact this plan
to earn any sort of reward, the card is
a pleasant result nonetheless.$k$p$nMPID_双界リシテア|It's just these sorts of surprises
that makes our experiments so
interesting. We must treasure this!
やあーっ
ええーいっ
きゃああっ
S-so, cold...
Miscalculated...
$nMPID_二人|We're just that good!
$nMPID_二人|A gift! Be grateful.
$nMPID_双界リシテア|This is for you!
$nMPID_ルーテ|Have a pleasant eve.
I don't...need presents...
No need for mercy.
Don't dawdle.
"On this night..." "Something wonderful."
"Do I hear sleighbells?" "Focus, Lute!"
Hehe...
"So many sweets... I'm so happy..." "Compounds with sugars are effective on superior brains."
And?
Delivery!
We will be thorough.

$nMPID_双界リシテア|*sigh* There's still a mountain of
presents to sort through.$k$pWho'd have thought that helping
at the winter festival would be
such hard work?

I just want to be done so we can
enjoy the festival. I saw a lot of
delicious-looking sweets at the plaza...

$nMPID_ルーテ|Lysithea. There's no time to rest.$k$pAccording to my calculations, if we
stop now, we won't be done here
until dawn.
$nMPID_双界リシテア|I-I know that. I was just saying...

$nMPID_ルーテ|So, you actually want to go to the
festival? It does seem like something
a child would enjoy.

$nMPID_双界リシテア|Hey! Who are you calling a child? It's
not like I want to go to a festival!

Who needs baked sweets anyway? All
those cakes. And cookies with cream.
And berry-covered tarts. And—

$nMPID_ルーテ|You retain quite a high level of detail
for someone who isn't interested. I'm
impressed by how observant you are.

$nMPID_双界リシテア|Indeed I do. But to be sure, we ought
to investigate further, and if possible,
confirm the flavors as well!

$nMPID_ルーテ|Ah, the captivation of a curious mind.
That I can understand.

But now I've grown hungry from all
of this manual labor.$k$pMaybe it would be in our best
interest to investigate those sweets.

$nMPID_双界リシテア|Yes! We should take a break to
enjoy—I mean investigate—the
festival.

$nMPID_ルーテ|That could be a worthwhile use of
our time. Upon consideration, I am
now thirsty.

Tell me, Lysithea, did you also
happen to observe sweetened
beverages for sale in the plaza?

$nMPID_双界リシテア|No, I didn't see those! You're very
perceptive, Lute.
$nMPID_ルーテ|Yes. I'm just that good.

$nMPID_双界リシテア|I think I'm pretty good too, you know.
Anyway, let's go. We can prove how
perceptive we are at the plaza!
$nMPID_ルーテ|Now that does sound enjoyable.
